page.title: 08VIEWS ON GILDERSOME
page.content: {My name is Michael Richardson and I am 11 years old.I was born on 12-5-74 and I have lived in Gildersome all my life.I live at 27,Harthill in a semi- detached house and I have one brother and sister who have both left school.I am in my final year at Birchfield J&I School.In September I start at Brunt- cliffe High School.I play football for school and for a local junior soccer team called Gildersome Spurs.I go training once a week and play football at the weekend.On Wednesday night I go to Boys Brigade. {I like Gildersome because there are a lot of things to do for children of my age.There is a park for little child- ren although I think it could be a little larger.I think that Gildersome should have a few more shops and is badly in need of a cafe.
